
                            
                            <p>号称奶茶0.1元抢的<a href="http://dpurl.cn/1g5fIXcz" target="_blank" class="infotextkey">美团</a>神抢手活动 抢了个益禾堂 <br> 发现这是个12元券，最少的店铺是15起送，下不了单 <br> <img referrerpolicy=" " src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202505/10/163633fnayjppeuybag4ay.jpg" data-fancybox="article-img" data-src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202505/10/163633fnayjppeuybag4ay.jpg"> <br> 加3元钱的小料凑到15元，提示“单点不送”……感情它不认为兑换的那杯12的奶茶属于点单了 <br> <img referrerpolicy=" " src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202505/10/163715u9wrhwzhcxc77q5j.jpg" data-fancybox="article-img" data-src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202505/10/163715u9wrhwzhcxc77q5j.jpg"> <br> 选自提，提示“不可单点” <br> <img referrerpolicy=" " src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202505/10/163816uzaqcf4apyw308il.jpg" data-fancybox="article-img" data-src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202505/10/163816uzaqcf4apyw308il.jpg"> <br> 昨天见识到京东快外卖一个包子加1元的打包费 <br> 今天见识到益禾堂这样的奸商不愿出血也来蹭美团活动 <br>  <br> 外卖界真是多奇葩。奸商是真鸡巴多。  <br> </p><p class="pl">加购，我记得最后，可以用会员红包抵扣。实付0.01</p><p></p>
